abstract: Detroit's victory over the Yankees draws 9.7 million viewers.
snippet: Detroit's victory over the Yankees draws 9.7 million viewers.
lead_paragraph: Rooting for or against the New York Yankees has become a tradition for baseball fans and it created record numbers for TBS on Thursday night when the Yankees fell to the Detroit Tigers, 3-2, and 9.7 million viewers were glued to their television screens. It was the most-watched League Division Series game in cable history and the most-watched Division Series game on either network TV or cable since 2005.

headline.main: TBS a Winner, Along With Tigers
